text: Ciraiyilirukkum en iru tolarkale! (Unkal kanavukalin palankalavana) unkaliruvaril oruvar tam ejamananukku tiratcai matuvaip pukattik kontiruppar; marravaro ciluvaiyil araiyappattu, avar talaiyiliruntu paravaikal kottit tinnum; ninkaliruvarum vilakkam koriya kariyam (kanavin palan) vitikkappattuvittatu" (enru yusuhp kurinar)
